column1: Little Goat Diner////I would like to put a spotlight on the "Fat Elvis" and also upload a photograph
column2: as if I only describe it some of us would not believe it is true. So you get waffles with balls of peanut-butter
column4: sliced bananas and tiny bacon specks-bits. I have not weighed it all
column5: but as a rough estimate I guess that might be a 1000 calorie breakfast dish. You may think that can't be healthy
column6: but if you eat apples and carrots til dinnertime you probably did yourself some good anyhow
column7: because your soul had so much fun eating it and the psychology of food should NEVER be underestimated in questions of truly healthy nutrition. (If that does not convince: bananas contain plenty of potassium and pork is a great source of Â Vitamin B... so there: justified!)
